Rule.name: Won't idolize someone you don't like

InfluenceRule.name: you wanna idolize popular people
Likely to idolize people you have a crush on
Likely to idolize people you envy
Unlikely to idolize people you're annoyed with
Unlikely to idolize people you pity
Unlikely to idolize people you're angry at
Likely to idolize people if kind
Likely to idolize people if sympathetic
Likely to idolize people if smooth talker
Likely to idolize people if humble
Likely to idolize people if jealous
Unlikely to idolize people if oblivious
Unlikely to idolize people if arrogant
Unlikely to idolize people if mean
Unlikely to idolize people if cold
Likely to idolize people you think are cool
Unlikely to idolize people you think are lame
Unlikely to idolize people you think are rude
popular people don't idolize people
i homewrecked r
Competitive people like being idolized
Attention hogs love being idolized
Sex magnets like being idolized
Ripped people like being idolized
Witty people like being idolized
Insecure people dislike being idolized
Humble people dislike being idolized
Defensive people dislike being idolized
Oblivious people dislike being idolized
Embarrassed people dislike being idolized
Anxious people dislike being idolized
Heartbroken people dislike being idolized
Nice to be idolized by someone you have a crush on
Nice to be idolized by someone you trust
Don't want to be idolized by someone you're angry at
Nice to be idolized by someone you've been mean to
Nice to be idolized by someone you're dating

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% thought %r% %pron(r,was/were)% cool
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% all fawning over %r% and it was like embarrassing
%i% thought it was pretty cool that %pron(i,he/she)% and %r% were both into %CKB_((i,likes),(r,likes),())%s
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% totally into %CKB_((i,likes),(r,likes),())%s way before %i%
%i% remembered that cool thing %r% did
%i% thought that thing %r% did was cool but it totally wasn't
%i% became like %rp% creepy apprentice or something
%i% started acting way too much like %r%
%i% praised %rp% virtues
%i% said %r% was the best friend evar
%i% sucked up to %r%
%i% tried to suck up to %r%
%i% immortalized %r% in the form of art
%r% shot down %ip% attempt to immortalize %pron(r,him/her)% in the form of art
%i% idolized %r% for being %pron(i,his/her)% sweetie
%i% tricked %r% into admitting %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% cheating on %pron(i,him/her)%
%i% thought it was somehow okay to say both %list(r,o,and)% were pretty
%i% idolized %r% to get tips on dating %pron(r,his/her)% %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%
%i% idolized %r% for being able to juggle relationships
%i% thought that thing %r% did was cool even though it was actually kind of gross
%i% successfully flattered %r% even though %list(i,r,we/they)% were enemies
%i% came off like a serial killer in %pron(i,his/her)% attempt to idolize %r%
%i% lifted %rp% spirits with memories of good times
%i% tried to save his relationship with %r% but %prons(r,he/she)% just wanted to end it
%list(i,o,and)% both fawned over %r%
%i% sucked up to %r% but %rs% %pron(r,was/were)%n't really sure who %i% %pron(i,was/were)%

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Generic Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%! Uh, I just wanted to tell you... I think your %random(shoes are,hair is,fashion sense is,style is,philosophy of life is,personality is)% like totally cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Oh yeah,You think,Really)%? Hey, thanks, %i%. You're pretty cool yourself.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hehe, thanks.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Generic Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%! Uh, I just wanted to tell you... I think your %random(shoes,hair,fashion sense,style,philosophy of life,personality)% is like totally cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... %random(I don't remember allowing you to talk to me.,who are you again?,that's nice. I'll remember that if I ever start caring about what you think.)% Go away now.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Both Think I is Cool Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%. Hey, I heard you're into %toc1%s. That's totally awesome. I love %toc1%s.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? That's cool. I've been into %toc1%s since before they were popular.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: omg really? You are so awesome!

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Both Think I is Cool Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%. Hey, I heard you're into %toc1%s. That's totally awesome. I love %toc1%s.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, it's like everyone's into %toc1%s these days. I was into %toc1%s before they were cool. You're just a sheep.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Cool Past Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What's up, %r%. Hey, I heard about that time when %toc1%. That was awesome!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You think so? I guess some people wouldn't think that was cool, but it's awesome that you do.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hella. I totally blogged about it.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Uncool Past Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What's up, %r%. Hey, I heard about that time when %toc1%. That was awesome!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Are you on crack?,What's wrong with you?,You have got to be kidding.,r u serious?)% How could you think that was cool?
You're weird.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Did someting to Idolize Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hey, %r%. Uh, you remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, yeah?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I did it to be more like you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excellent. You are ready to begin your training.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Did someting to Idolize Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hey, %r%. Uh, you remember when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, yeah?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I did it to be more like you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's weird and creepy. %random(Don't touch me,You go away now,Stop talking to me,I'm going over here now)%.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Character Virtue Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%... hey, uh, I just wanted to say... I think you're a really %cat(r,cat: character virtue)% person.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's really %gender(r,cool,sweet)%, %i%. You're a pretty good person too.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks, %r%.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Friendship Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%. You know you're like totally my best friend, right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? Wow, %i%, that's %positiveadj%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah. I just %random(find you really inspiring,really kind of look up to you,think you're an awesome person,am glad to be your friend)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, thanks.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - High to Low Cool Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%! What's up? Hey, I just wanted to say I think you're a totally %positiveadj% person. Like maybe the most %positiveadj%-est in school.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh. Uhhhh... thanks. That's... nice of you to say.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wow, thanks %r%. Hey, stay cool!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(No problemo,Sure will,You bet)%.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - High to Low Cool Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%! What's up? Hey, I just wanted to say I think you're a totally %positiveadj% person. Like maybe the most %positiveadj%-est in school.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, uhhhh, no offense, but I really would rather you didn't talk to me at all. Like, someone might see us and get the idea that we're friends or something.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh. Uh... yeah, we wouldn't want that.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - High to High Romance Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, wait up! Hey, did you get that note I left on your desk in %random(trig,history,chemistry,physics,gym,algebra,health,ceramics)% class?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OMG yeah. %random(That was an amazing sketch. It looks JUST like me,Your poetry is so amazing. Nobody's ever written me an ode before)%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, that? That was just something I was playing with in class.
But it came from the heart.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're so modest.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - High to Low Romance Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, wait up! Hey, did you get that note I left on your desk in %random(trig,history,chemistry,physics,gym,algebra,health,ceramics)% class?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Um, yeah I did. Look, %random(if I wanted some weirdo writing poems about me I would have gone to private school,if I wanted some jerk drawing inappropriate pictures of me I'd be hanging out at the bus station)%. Knock it off.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just wanted to let you know how amazing I think you are.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why don't you amaze someone else for a while?

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Dating Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%... have I told you today that you're the light of my life, the wind in my sails, the %random(carrots in my stew,clouds in my sky,channels in my cable package,comments in my blogosphere,clowns in my circus,the 'like' button on my status update)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Flattery will get you %random(nowhere,everywhere)%, %gender(i,mister,darling)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: As long as it gets me closer to you, it doesn't matter where else it takes me.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Idolizing a Cheater

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %sweetie%, what's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just wanted to tell you how great you are!
Also, I love the way you compliment my looks...
And all the time we spend together...
And how you cheat on me!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah!
Wait, I didn't mean to-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Save it, we're through!

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Idolizing a Cheated with other

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just love the way you look.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh really, I was trying out this new hair product and I didn't know whe-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %o%! Uh, your hair is lovely too!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ex*cuse* me? You were just in the middle of complimenting *me*!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I like you both! You're both pretty!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're unbelievable!

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Homewrecker idolizing the one being cheated on

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting% %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just wondering how you wake up every day looking *that* amazing?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just takes a lot of time and practice. Why do you ask?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nothing too big, it's just that I'm probably going to be having more and more dates with %o% and I thought I would get some tips from you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What?! How could you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well %o% is interested in me, why wouldn't I go out with %pron(o,him/her)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't believe you! Stay away from %pron(o,him/her)%, or else!

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Homewrecker idolizing the cheater

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just thinking about how dreamy you are being able to juggle between %o% and me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But you know which one I like most right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Is it me?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh huh, and don't forget it.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Responder is weirded out by Initiator

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hi %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You were so cool when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ummm, what? I wouldn't call that 'cool'...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, I thought it was cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're weird.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Enemies accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %r%. We may not like each other much but I have to admit... you're a pretty amazing person.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Tell me something I *don't* know. You just trying to suck up to me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well yeah, I thought it would work.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're pathetic.
But... I *am* an amazing person. So I'll admit you got something right.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - A bit too desperate crush

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Umm, hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I could just get lost in your eyes, they are mesmerizing.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I guess they are pretty cool...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And your hair, it's just so perfectly shaped for your head.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ummm, where are you going with this?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And those lips are just so... delicious.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I'm going to go over here now. Please don't follow me.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - No longer sad

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...Oh, hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What's wrong?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I've been just feeling down recently.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Awe. Hey, I remember when %toc1%.
That was pretty %positiveadj% in my book.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I guess that was good. Thanks for helping me get out of this slump.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Any time %buddy%!

Instantiation.name: Idolize - (SS7 Act-3) Person from Act 2 confronts girlfriend/boyfriend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%, what's the best %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)% in the world up to?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just stuff... and stuff.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know you're the cutest %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)% ever and I never want to let you go?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh yeah, about that kind of thing... I kind of like hearing it from %o% better.
Yeah, %pron(o,he/she)% just texted me and asked to meet later. You know, 'meet.'
Cool, so, I gotta run. Later!

Instantiation.name: Idolize - Both I and O think R is really great

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey hey hey, if it isn't %r%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, how's it going?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Great, now that you're here! I could just %random(bask in your presence, drink from your sweet breath,gaze at you longingly from a distance, give you a steady and constant stream of high-fives)% all day!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's great, %i%, but dont you think that's going a little overboard?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No way, everyone in school agrees with me! Hey, %o%, who is the coolest %gender(r,guy,girl)% around?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Oh, %r%, no question. %r% %random(is the bee's knees, is the cat's meow, is the mouse's cheese, is the chinchilla's dustbath)%. Totally cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, ok. If you guys say so.

Instantiation.name: Idolize - High to Low Cool Accept w no prior interactions

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%! What's up? Hey, I just wanted to say I think you're a totally %positiveadj% person. Like maybe the most %positiveadj%-est in school.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh. Uhhhh... thanks. That's... nice of you to say. Um... what was your name again?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh %r%, you're such a kidder. Stay cool!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...wow, %gender(i,he,she)% seems really nice. I totally SHOULD figure out what %gender(i,his,her)% name is.
